name: CodeAnalysisPlugin
description: Provides tools for code linting, formatting, and complexity analysis.
author: ApexAgent Team

actions.name: lint_code
actions.description: Lints the provided code content using a specified linter.

parameters.name: code_content
parameters.description: The source code content to lint.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The programming language of the code (e.g., "python", "javascript"). Helps select appropriate linter behavior.

actions.name: format_code
actions.description: Formats the provided code content using a specified formatter.

parameters.name: code_content
parameters.description: The source code content to format.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The programming language of the code.

actions.name: analyze_complexity
actions.description: Analyzes the cyclomatic complexity and other metrics of the provided Python code.

parameters.name: code_content
parameters.description: The Python source code content to analyze.
